definition: to not understand/to be puzzled by/indissoluble
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to remain puzzled after pondering over sth a hundred times (idiom)/to remain perplexed despite much thought
lit. distant water does not cure present thirst; fig. urgent need/a slow remedy does not address immediate needs
pinyin: yuan3 shui3 bu4 jie3 jin4 ke3

sentences.english: A lot of Occidentals feel puzzled to this question.
sentences.chinese: 许多西方人对此感到困惑不解。

sentences.english: I puzzled over it for hours before it finally clicked .
sentences.chinese: 我对这一问题茫然不解，几小时后终于顿开茅塞。
这就是他所不解的地方。

sentences.english: Why everybody liked him was what puzzled Jo, at first.
sentences.chinese: 首先，为什么每个人都喜欢教授，这令乔迷惑不解。
这个问题使我迷惑不解。

sentences.english: Perelman's aversion to public spectacle and to riches is mystifying to many.
sentences.chinese: 佩雷尔曼对公众活动和财富的反感令许多人不解。

sentences.english: Make light of your apparent dumbness and ask for a repeat.
sentences.chinese: 别在乎你不解的样子，请对方再重复一遍。

sentences.english: It baffled me that he rejected my offer.
sentences.chinese: 他拒绝我的建议使我迷惑不解。

sentences.english: He was wedded already to his books and his parish .
sentences.chinese: 他早已同他的书本和教区结了不解之缘。

sentences.english: His strange behaviour perplexed her greatly.
sentences.chinese: 他的奇怪举止使她茫然不解。

sentences.english: What puzzles me is how he was able to cover such a long distance on foot.
sentences.chinese: 让我迷惑不解的是他如何能徒步走那么远。

sentences.english: I puzzled over this question for a long time before it finally clicked.
sentences.chinese: 我对这个问题茫然不解，过了很长时间终于明白过来。

sentences.english: WoWei BaiSiBuXie for ginger, deeply regrettable sinus.
sentences.chinese: 沃威百思不解，替姜窦深深地可惜。

sentences.english: My children are left stunned, my husband bewildered and my friends unsupportive.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们大吃一惊，丈夫疑惑不解，朋友们也不支持。

sentences.english: But Ling was mystifying to me.
sentences.chinese: 但是令狐冲的行为让我很不解。

definition: to be startled/to be shocked/to be amazed
to be surprised/to be amazed/to be stunned
to be amazed/to be surprised/to wonder
see 百思不解[bai3 si1 bu4 jie3]
pinyin: bai3 si1 bu4 de2 qi2 jie3
